set.desc: Assigns HID LED to the desired state
set.doc:
Assigns HID LED to the desired state

Parameters:
 * name  - LED name: "caps", "scroll" or "num"
 * state - A boolean indicating desired state

Returns:
 * true if success, false if error

Notes:
 * This function controls the LED state only, to modify capslock state, use hs.hid.capslock.set
set.name: set
notes: * This function controls the LED state only, to modify capslock state, use hs.hid.capslock.set
parameters: * state - A boolean indicating desired state
returns: * true if success, false if error
